sectionDescription: Explore our recent highlights and special events.

items.title: Aqua Women & Beatles
items.description: Musical gatherings at Espaço Aqua celebrating female performances with a Beatles tribute.

items.title: Aqua Cover Show
items.description: Exclusive cover show at Espaço Aqua, featuring a thematic repertoire and striking audiovisual production.

items.title: Sound with a Brazilian Accent
items.description: A showcase of Brazilian music highlighting regional rhythms and local artists.

items.description: All the highlights from the ‘Sete Vidas’ launch party, from behind-the-scenes to the main moments.
